data.title: Structure
data.meta_description: The organisational structure of Victoria Police, including our associations and networks.
data.text:
All departments, regions and commands within Victoria Police fall within a particular office. These offices make up the Victoria Police Executive Command.

Organisational structure chart

The Office of the Chief Commissioner provides the first point of contact between Victoria Police and the Police Minister's office and other Government Departments.

Areas of oversight and management are:

State Emergencies & Support Command

The four Regions of Victoria:

North West Metro

Southern Metro

Western

Eastern.

Family Violence Command

Forensic Services Department

Legal Services Department

Road Policing Command.

Counter Terrorism Command

Crime Command

Intelligence and Covert Support Command

Transit and Public Safety Command

Taskforce Reset.

Capability Department

Media, Communications and Engagement Department (MCED)

People Development Command (PDC)

Professional Standards Command (PSC)

Service Delivery Transformation Command (SDTC).

Office of the Deputy Secretary, Corporate and Regulatory Services

The Deputy Secretary Corporate and Regulatory Services is Susan Middleditch.

Human Resources Command

Regulatory Services Department

Financial Services Department

Investment, Governance and Assurance Department

Police Enquiry and Data Sharing Department.

Office of the Deputy Secretary, IT and Infrastructure Services

The Deputy Secretary IT and Infrastructure is Karl Kent, OAM.

Operational Infrastructure Department

Digital Services and Security Department.

Associations and networks
